traits.abilities: is powerful, brawny, and strong as an ox, but is sickly and pale

personality.mannerism: Brings up anecdotal backstory as examples to conversation Eg. 'Hey that reminds me of the time I-'
personality.interaction: is always honest with the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Slowly, at a Normal pitch.
voice.quirk: soft letters are elongated ('sso, hhow arre yyou?')
